sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>Beacon</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result/> <number>TS0004635</number> <order>49</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>SHILL</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 21:36:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2a56e95fdbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961958</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>SHILL</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 21:36:30</sys_updated_on> <test>If testing one of the five clinics listed above complete the following: From the Plan activity Open the Smartset HNR OP Oncology labs. Open Smartset and if one of the 5 above clinics, select "clinic performed labs". Select the CBC with Differential. Change status to standing and class should be clinic collect. Resulting agency must be set to HonorHealth for the 5 depts, all other departments should display as LabCorp. Accept the CBC. Next under Outpatient labs order a CMP. Status should autofill as Future, lab collect and Resulting Agency set to LabCorp. Associate diagnoses and sign the order.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001020">3c9f19d3dbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961918</test_script> <testing_user>VPCMD - provider</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
